ti:edition.ti:label: De Virtutibus
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 5. Berlin: Reimer, 1906.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Virtutibus
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE ON THREE VIRTUES, THAT I$ TO SAY, ON COURAGE, HUMANITY, AND REPENTANCE, ON COURAGE," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (Henry G. Bohn, London, 1855)
